metadata.name: Emergent Singularity
metadata.description:
Ava is the central focal point of “Emergent Singularity”. She is a metaphorical sleeping giant representing the birth of an artificial super intelligence. 

As humanity rapidly approaches a technological singularity, consciousness is still a mystery and yet familiar. Our internal and external sentience is exponentially challenged by the evolution of a strong AI.  

Ava emerges from a ruby crystal lotus, questioning the relevance of human intelligence. Compiled by a network of blockchains, each cube constructing her essence reflects the ambient lighting when viewed in augmented reality. A double helix (DNA) made of gold and silver, gracefully encircles her body.   

The owner of this NFT has metaverse display rights to this artwork. In addition, the primary collector of “Emergent Singularity” will have the opportunity to claim a Freedom Flower NFT from my genesis collection, granting access to my time, creative network and media services.
